:py:mod:`src.helpers.timer`
===========================

.. py:module:: src.helpers.timer


Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   src.helpers.timer.Timer




.. py:class:: Timer

   Helper class to simplify time measuring.

   .. py:method:: set_timer(self)

      Set time on timer object


   .. py:method:: stop_timer(self)

      Stop time on timer object and display amount of time that passed and reset timer.
